thread.title: First Look at Chad Michael Murray and Patrick Schwarzenegger on 'Scream Queens' Arrive
thread.title_full: First Look at Chad Michael Murray and Patrick Schwarzenegger on 'Scream Queens' Arrive

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: First Look at Chad Michael Murray and Patrick Schwarzenegger on 'Scream Queens' Arrive
text:
Comments Both Murray and Schwarzenegger, who play Chad Radwell's brothers, were spotted on the set of the new FOX series in New Orleans, La. on Tuesday. 
Chad Michael Murray and Patrick Schwarzenegger have begun filming their scenes for " Scream Queens " after they were cast on the show last month. The two hunks looked preppy in long sleeve shirts and pants on the set in New Orleans, La. on Tuesday, September 29. Co-stars Lea Michele and Emma Roberts were also spotted on the set that day. Murray has been teasing fans about his upcoming appearance on the new horror anthology series by sharing pictures from the set. On Tuesday, he posted on Instagram a picture of him and Glen Powell. "Meet the Radwell boys! @screamqueensfox @glenpowell #Brad #Chad," so he captioned the image. A photo posted by Chad Murray (@chadmurray15) on Sep 29, 2015 at 4:38pm PDT He also took to Twitter to share an image showing him and Powell grabbing breakfast on the filming location. Murray additionally posted on his Twitter a photo of him getting ready to film his scene. A photo posted by Glen Powell (@glenpowell) on Sep 30, 2015 at 2:46pm PDT — Chad Michael Murray (@ChadMMurray) October 1, 2015 Murray and Schwarzenegger play Chad Radwell's (Powell) older brother Brad and younger brother Thad respectively. Alan Thicke and Julia Duffy have been cast as the Radwell parents. The first season of "Scream Queens", which debuted on September 22, centers on a college campus rocked by several murders. Jamie Lee Curtis , Keke Palmer , Billie Lourd and Abigail Breslin , Oliver Hudson , Skyler Samuels and Nasim Pedrad also star on the series. The show airs Tuesdays at 9 P.M. on FOX.
